src:
侍・山口　準備ＯＫ　５日ベネズエラ戦先発濃厚

04 Nov 2019

　国際大会「プレミア１２」に臨む野球日本代表「侍ジャパン」が３日、台湾・桃園市の桃園国際野球場で３時間の調整を行った。
　５日・ベネズエラ戦に先発濃厚な山口が、ブルペンで最終調整を行った。打席に立った丸にボールの軌道を確認し「いい感覚でした」と納得の表情。前回登板した１０月３１日・カナダ戦は２回６失点の大乱調だったが「ボール（の違い）は関係ない。自分がアジャストするだけなので」と不安はない。
text:
Sakai / Yamaguchi Preparation OK 5th Venezuela Warfare Rich

04 Nov 2019

The Japanese baseball team “SAMURAI JAPAN” who will face the international tournament “Premier 12” coordinated for 3 hours at Taoyuan International Baseball Stadium in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
On the 5th, Yamaguchi, who started with the game against Venezuela, made the final adjustment with the bullpen. Confirming the trajectory of the ball in the circle at the bat, “It was a good sensation,” he was satisfied. The last match on October 31, Canada, was a turbulent game with 6 goals twice, but there is no concern that “the ball is not relevant.
